snippet.title: Rayman: The Dreamer's Boundary - Final Trailer (GAME OUT NOW!) (Fan Game)
snippet.description:
The Final Trailer is here! The release date is the 15th of September!

I hope you enjoy this final preview of the game before it comes out. This game has been an absolute labour of love for me and I'm so proud to see it finally be ready for release to you wonderful people.

You can check out the game page on GameJolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/dreamersboundary/507525

Follow me on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/theCallumB_

Music by the extremely talented Project AER/Alexander Reade
https://twitter.com/ProjectAER

Artwork splash screens and the main cover artwork by the wonderful PeppermintBubble (its SOOO good!!!)
https://twitter.com/PeppermntBubble

Polokus has been banished from the realm of Dreams. Rayman is our only hope, he must travel across the world, face fierce nightmarish monsters and reach the edge of the dream, the Dreamer's Boundary, to fix the breach in reality.

#Rayman #TheDreamersBoundary #fangame #Trailer
